      Methods in io.hekate.messaging.broadcast that throw MessagingFutureException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AggregateFuture.forEach(Consumer<? super T> action)
      Awaits for the asynchronous aggregation to complete and performs the given action for each element of the aggregation results.
      Collection<T> AggregateFuture.results()
      Awaits for the asynchronous aggregation to complete and returns the AggregateResult.results() result}.
      Collection<T> AggregateFuture.results(long timeout, TimeUnit unit)
      Awaits for the asynchronous aggregation to complete within the timeout and returns the AggregateResult.results() result}.
      Collection<T> AggregateFuture.resultsUninterruptedly()
      Uninterruptedly awaits for the asynchronous aggregation to complete and returns the AggregateResult.results() result}.

      Awaits for the asynchronous operation to complete and returns the payload of reply.

      Awaits for the asynchronous operation to complete within the timeout and returns the payload of reply.

      Uninterruptedly awaits for the asynchronous operation to complete and returns the payload of reply.
